channel.title: GTLVote
channel.description:
hey moparscape. im having a error with my auto vote ( doing it for first time dont hate :P )
error:
[24/03/2015 01:34 PM]: [GTLVote V1.1] Settings initializing... [24/03/2015 01:34 PM]: [GTLVote V1.1] Error connecting to the database. [24/03/2015 01:34 PM]: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure
The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 milliseconds ago. The driver has not received any packets from the server.
thanks for youre time :)

hey moparscape. im having a error with my auto vote ( doing it for first time dont hate )
